channel.title: Runecrafting problem
channel.description:
When people are on my server (immortalscape.no-ip.info :p) and try to runecraft at the air rift, it works fine till they level up and then it says "line 1 line 2" and lags them off, leaving them without the runes they crafted or the exp.
I'd be more than happy to reward anyone that can help, thanks :)

item.title: Runecrafting problem
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You didn’t set up anyting to handle a level advance? Because the change of playerLevel[20] is messing up your program.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting problem
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Is it possible they’re clicking too fast?

Line1
Line2 is when they level up, and if they suddenly disconnect…

Connection :o.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting problem
item.dc:creator: @Immortal Immortal
item.description:
@Immortal wrote:

[code]if (objectID == 7139) // Air rift
{
actionAmount++;

				if (actionTimer == 0)
				{
                      if((playerLevel[20]) <= 0)
                      {
                           sendMessage("You need to be level 1 runecrafting to craft air runes.");
                      }

                      else if((playerLevel[20]) >= 0)
                      {
                           actionName = "airs";
                           actionTimer = 1;
                      }       
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1) 
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait before you can make more runes.");
                      }                                          
			    }
		    }
      if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("airs"))
	{
		sendMessage("You craft some runes.");
		addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[20]), 20);
		addItem(556, 500);
		actionName = "";
	}[/code]

Read full topic
